sys_ui_page.description:
This solution is NOT using a Document Template. At least not yet. For the moment... repurposing an arbitrary Incident Record to hold the PDF Fillable Form. Manually Attached the PDF to the Record. Then using that Form... with the PDF Generator API to get Information From it.. and to Add Information To a new PDF... (using this Fillable Form as the Template).
Apparently building a JSON structure that matches the PDF's internal Structure... Allows for overwriting of the field content (in-memory).. and subsequently output to Disk. (as attachment to a record).
SysID of -1 tells ServiceNow to create a New Record (supposedly)
Article For this Code: https://community.servicenow.com/community?id=community_blog&sys_id=4acc6265dbd0dbc01dcaf3231f961949
Also checkout a Licensed Solution on the ServiceNow Store: https://store.servicenow.com/sn_appstore_store.do#!/store/application/ad5c5f11f7131200d03eedd0358dff1b/2.2.1?referer=sn_appstore_store.do%23!%2Fstore%2Fsearch%3Fq%3DUXstorm
